alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:19PM EDT until July 08 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Monmouth County in central New Jersey... Northeastern Middlesex County in northern New Jersey... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 219 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Brunswick, or near New Brunswick, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Middletown, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Keansburg, Matawan, Jamesburg, Brownville, North Brunswick Township, Morganville, Lincroft, Whittingham, Woodbridge, South River, Highland Park, Spotswood and Keyport. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 10 and 12. Interstate 287 in New Jersey near mile marker 0. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 112 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
